China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 1 月 25 日星期四 19:41:02 GMT 120
Chinese music student convicted in US of threatening pro-democracy activistA Chinese music student was convicted on Thursday of U.S. charges that he harassed an activist who posted fliers at the Berklee College of Music in Boston supporting democracy in China and threatened to report her activities to Chinese law enforcement. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 17:36:00 GMT 7WTLPJMDSVIBJBWIBYFOHCQB7Y https://www.reuters.com/world/us/chinese-music-student-convicted-us-throne-pro-democracy-activist-2024-01-25/Nate Raymond世界美国
Yastremska happy to avoid qualifiers after Australian Open run endsDayana Yastremska did not feel too dejected by her semi-final defeat at the Australian Open as she knows her run would have boosted her rankings so that she can get direct entry into tournaments rather than playing in the qualifiers. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 17:34:10 GMT UFVTO7WJPZJPPHM5DRV7H73NAE https://www.reuters.com/sports/tennis/yastremska-happy-avoid-qualifiers-after-australian-open-run-ends-2024-01-25/Reuters运动的网球
China Evergrande unit to sell entire stake in asset to cut debtChina Evergrande said on Thursday one of its units had entered a deal to sell its entire stake in Shantou Hengmeng Property Development for 137.6 million yuan ($19.20 million). Thu, 25 Jan 2024 14:58:26 GMT ERYDCT4KM5KJTLYCXILFSV5VZU https://www.reuters.com/business/china-evergrande-unit-sell-entire-stake-asset-cut-debt-2024-01-25/Reuters商业
Sabalenka edges Gauff to set up Australian Open final against ZhengAryna Sabalenka continued her confident march towards a second successive Australian Open crown with a 7-6(2) 6-4 victory over Coco Gauff in a blockbuster semi-final on Thursday to set up a title-decider against Chinese 12th seed Zheng Qinwen. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 14:16:21 GMT IYFL4XKNFFOOBDF2Y73N6HYUWA https://www.reuters.com/sports/tennis/sabalenka-edges-gauff-set-up-melbourne-final-against-chinas-zheng-2024-01-25/Shrivathsa Sridhar, Sonali Paul运动的网球
Italy uncovers $1.9 billion fraud linked to Chinese shadow bank networkItalian police said on Thursday they had uncovered a tax fraud carried out by 85 suspects involving 1.7 billion euros ($1.9 billion) in false invoices, with the money laundered through a system of so-called Chinese shadow banks. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 13:35:52 GMT 66XMITEGSBMYTAE64TQ6IJYDHE https://www.reuters.com/business/finance/italy-uncovers-19-bln-fraud-linked-chinese-shadow-bank-network-2024-01-25/Reuters商业金融
China's Zheng snares maiden Grand Slam final spot at Australian OpenChina's Zheng Qinwen ended the fairytale run of qualifier Dayana Yastremska at the Australian Open with a 6-4 6-4 victory on Thursday to reach her first Grand Slam final, where she will face defending champion Aryna Sabalenka. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 12:51:57 GMT UAFGXMEYIVO2NKDQ5RYI3VGWNE https://www.reuters.com/sports/tennis/chinas-zheng-books-maiden-grand-slam-final-berth-australian-open-2024-01-25/Sonali Paul运动的网球
